remarks: Connectitivy law for betweenness.  Theorem 5.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 39-41.  In earlier presentations of Tarski's axioms, this theorem appeared as an additional axiom.  It was derived from the other axioms by Gupta, 1965.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Apr-2019.)
statement:
tgbtwnconn1.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I C ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn1.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I D ) ) $.
tgbtwnconn1 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( A I D ) \/ D e. ( A I C ) ) ) $.
